heading: Today
text: Some morning clouds northeast, then morning sun giving way to increasing afternoon clouds. Some afternoon snow showers in NY, spreading east into VT. Highs 10 to 15 north, 15 to 20 south. Winds northwest near 10 mph this morning, gusting to 20 mph in NH, diminishing to light this afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds, with a few snow showers, mainly in the north and mountains. Becoming partly cloudy in southern valleys. Lows 5 above to 5 below zero. Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning clouds north, with breaks of afternoon sun. Sun mixing with periods of clouds south. Highs 10 to 15 north, 15 to 20 south. Winds light, becoming northwest near 10 mph.
